为什么生成AI在学术研究中扩大性别差距随着男性研究人员更有效地利用AI，研究的生产力差距扩大了。需要采取有针对性的干预措施来支持女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/why-generative-iai-is-widening-the-the-gap-gap-in-academic-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/why-generative-iai-is-widening-the-the-gap-gap-in-academic-research-saskearch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4185c18b-c133-4979-4979-87b5-401d1b05740e Wed, 12 Feb 2025 08:05:00 -0500 Why generative AI is widening the gender gap in academic research

研究揭示了南亚和东亚成年人的不同血压模式根据《美国心脏协会高血压》上发表的新研究，居住在英国的南亚和东亚成年人可能有独特的轨迹，可以在他们的生活过程中发展高血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/research-reveals-distinct-blood-pressure-pressure-pressure-pressure-pressns-in-south-asouth-asian-and-ash-and-ast-asian-asian-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/research-reveals-distinct-blood-pressure-press-press-patserns-in-south-asouth-asouth-asian-and-ash-ast--------- and-ast-asian-asian-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a543fe7-d9Ad-46A7-9303-E3BB44D8F334 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 06:41:00 -0500 Research reveals distinct blood pressure patterns in South Asian and East Asian adults
女性更喜欢女性心脏病专家来更好的心脏保健根据美国医师数据仪表板的数据，只有约17％的心脏病学家是女性，是女性医生中最低的专业之一，但心脏病仍然是女性的第一杀手，占女性五分之一的女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/women-prefer-female-female-cardiologists-for-better-heart-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/women-prefer-female-female-cardiologists-for-for-better-henret-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de1A0615-9525-422E-B116-56494FD496F5 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 06:38:00 -0500 Women prefer female cardiologists for better heart care

研究人员重点介绍了协作《我的世界》游戏的教育益处南澳大利亚大学的研究人员说，这是全球流行的视频游戏，引起了超过1.41亿活跃玩家的注意，但是Minecraft也可以在塑造儿童的发展，社交互动和认知学习方面发挥重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/researchers-highlight-the-educational-benefits-of-collaborative-minecraft-play.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/researchers-highlight-the-edecational-benefits-benefits-of-collaborative-minecraft-play.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d99E9B0B-5BA0-4664-A6CE-A6CE-A32F29841B90 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 02:28:15 -0500 Researchers highlight the educational benefits of collaborative Minecraft play
